token.description:
Token is the DigitalOcean API access token.

If left empty it must be provided via either `DIGITALOCEAN_TOKEN` or `DIGITALOCEAN_ACCESS_TOKEN` environment variable.

oneOf.description: SpacesRegions is a list of DO regions to fetch spaces from, if not given we execute on all regions

spaces_access_key.description: SpacesAccessKey is the secret access token generated in DO control panel

spaces_access_key_id.description: SpacesAccessKeyId is the unique identifier of the access key generated in the DO control panel

spaces_debug_logging.description: SpacesDebugLogging allows enabling AWS S3 request logging on spaces requests

Spec.description: Spec defines DigitalOcean source plugin Spec
